law.catch_line: Subject to provisions concerning budgetary and fiscal procedures contained in the employer's charter...
law.text: Subject to provisions concerning budgetary and fiscal procedures contained in the employer's charter, if ratified or approved by a legislative enactment of the employer, and if signed by the chief executive officer of the employer, a memorandum of understanding between the employer and an exclusive representative shall bind the employer for the period of time which is provided in the agreement.
